data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Meishan, Sichuan, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Meishan, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 140,284 who are far from you in Meishan, Sichuan, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Meishan to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Meishan, Sichuan, China the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Ga Mong people.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Meishan, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Meishan, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Meishan. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

location.name: Meishan
location.people_groups_list: Nosu, Xiaoliangshan, Naru, Naza, Mulao Jia, Nosu, Tianba
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nosu, Xiaoliangshan (551,000), Naru (16,000), Naza (1,800), Mulao Jia (41,000), Nosu, Tianba (111,000)
